Vine Bow

two handed weapon (lvl 4)

item id [id]: 85

damage [dmg]: 5
range [range]: 35
nbr of attacks [nratt]: 1
ammunition [ammo]: 12
 
(Requires Two Hands [twohanded], Piercing Damage [pierce], One Third Strength added [bowstr], Magic weapon [magic])

Extra effect on hit: Entanglement

weap id [weapon]: 137 (Entanglement)
damage [dmg]: Entangle
nbr of attacks [nratt]: 1
 
(Magic weapon [magic], Strength not added to damage [nostr])

Requires 5N to forge (N1)

This magic bow will fire living vines at the target. The vine arrows are neither very accurate nor effective, but they will stop even the largest of monsters for at least a short while.
